trans-unit.source: The DsmlResponseDocument class is a read-only collection generated as a response to a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> object that contains zero, or more, objects derived from <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La classe DsmlResponseDocument è una raccolta di sola lettura generata in risposta a un <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> oggetto che contiene zero o più oggetti derivati da <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method copies the entire collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CopyTo copia l'intera raccolta in una matrice unidimensionale, iniziando dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice unidimensionale che costituisce la destinazione degli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of `value` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero del `value` in cui ha inizio la copia.

trans-unit.source: value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: valueè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: i is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: iè minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: value is multidimensional -or- The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from *i* to the end of the destination value.
trans-unit.target: valueè multidimensionale o il numero di elementi nell'origine è maggiore dello spazio disponibile da *si* alla fine della destinazione value.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination value.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di origine non può essere eseguire automaticamente il cast al tipo della destinazione value .

trans-unit.source: The Count property contains the number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Count contiene il numero di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"> </xref> oggetti della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"> </xref> oggetti della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The GetEnumerator method returns an enumerator for the entire <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetEnumerator restituisce un enumeratore per l'intero <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object for the entire collection.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>oggetto per l'intera raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The IsErrorResponse property specifies whether an error response has occurred.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà IsErrorResponse specifica se si è verificato un errore della risposta.

trans-unit.source: This property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an error response has occurred; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se si è verificato un errore della risposta; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: The IsOperationError property specifies whether an operation error response has occurred.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà IsOperationError specifica se si è verificata una risposta di errore.

trans-unit.source: This property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an operation error has occurred; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se si è verificato un errore di operazione; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: The IsSynchronized property contains a value that indicates whether access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"></xref> is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: La proprietà IsSynchronized contiene un valore che indica se l'accesso al <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"> </xref> è sincronizzato (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"></xref> is synchronized (thread-safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'accesso al <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"> </xref> è sincronizzato (thread-safe); in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Item property contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà dell'elemento contiene il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index value at which the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"></xref> object is found.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"> </xref> oggetto viene trovato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The RequestId property contains the RequestID associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà ID richiesta contiene l'ID richiesta associato al documento.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only and throws an exception if you attempt to set the property value.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è di sola lettura e genera un'eccezione se si tenta di impostare il valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The RequestID associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: L'ID richiesta associato al documento.

trans-unit.source: You attempted to set the property value.
trans-unit.target: Si è tentato di impostare il valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The SyncRoot property contains an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà SyncRoot contiene un oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso al <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide synchronized versions of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument> using the SyncRoot property.
trans-unit.target: Classi derivate possono fornire versioni sincronizzate del <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument>utilizzando la proprietà SyncRoot.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the SyncRoot of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument>, not directly on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Il codice di sincronizzazione deve essere eseguite nella radice di sincronizzazione del <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument>, non direttamente sulla <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo si garantisce il corretto funzionamento delle raccolte derivate da altri oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: In particolare, viene mantenuta la sincronizzazione con altri thread che potrebbero modificare contemporaneamente il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument>oggetto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso al <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*> method copies the entire <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"></xref> collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*>metodo copia l'intero <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"> </xref> insieme in una matrice unidimensionale, iniziando dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*>

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice unidimensionale che costituisce la destinazione degli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of `value` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero del `value` in cui ha inizio la copia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.Count*> property gets the number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.Count*>proprietà ottiene il numero di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"> </xref> oggetti della raccolta.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.Count*>

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*> property gets a value that indicates whether access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"></xref> is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*>proprietà ottiene un valore che indica se l'accesso al <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"> </xref> è sincronizzato (thread-safe).</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"></xref> is synchronized (thread-safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'accesso al <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"> </xref> è sincronizzato (thread-safe); in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*> property gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*>proprietà ottiene un oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso al <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"> </xref>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ToXml method transforms each <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"></xref> object in the collection into an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ToXml trasforma ogni <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"> </xref> oggetto nella raccolta in un <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The transformed <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Trasformato <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref> oggetto.
